messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] working parents; was curious
messages.msgSnippet: ** I think that many people label daycare, working parents, etc as bad, Well...both owners of this site are working parents!:) I work outside the home
messages.messageBody:
**"I think that many people label daycare, working parents, etc as
bad,"

Well...both owners of this site are working parents!:)
I work outside the home too.....gasp.
And I choose to do it, I don't have to in order to survive. Big gasp.**


I don't think working parents are bad,not at all. Been there,done that. In my initial comment I was stating that I found it sad that most people knew people who had put their kids in full time daycare from 6 months up. I just dont know anyone who did that. I work from home, I wish I could afford to work at a job outside the home! LOL

Liz

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
